Uses of Package
io.vertx.micrometer

  • Packages that use io.vertx.micrometer 
    Package Description
    io.vertx.micrometer  
    io.vertx.micrometer.backends  
    io.vertx.rxjava3.micrometer  
  • Classes in io.vertx.micrometer used by io.vertx.micrometer 
    Class and Description
    Label
    List of labels used in various Vert.x metrics.
    Match
    A match for a value.
    MatchType
    The type of match.
    MetricsDomain
    Metric domains with their associated prefixes.
    MetricsNaming
    Options for naming all metrics
    MicrometerMetricsOptions
    Vert.x micrometer configuration.
    VertxInfluxDbOptions
    Vert.x InfluxDb micrometer configuration.
    VertxJmxMetricsOptions
    Options for Prometheus metrics backend.
    VertxPrometheusOptions
    Options for Prometheus metrics backend.
  • Classes in io.vertx.micrometer used by io.vertx.micrometer.backends 
    Class and Description
    Label
    List of labels used in various Vert.x metrics.

    A match for a value.

    Vert.x micrometer configuration.

  • Classes in io.vertx.micrometer used by io.vertx.rxjava3.micrometer 
    Class and Description
    MetricsService
    The metrics service mainly allows to return a snapshot of measured objects.
    This service is derived and adapted from MetricsService in the vertx-dropwizard-metrics module.
    PrometheusScrapingHandler
    A Vert.x Web Route handler for Prometheus metrics scraping.
